name: Colorful Collapse
description:
Colorful Collapse is a new free to play game, where your job is to collapse a tower made out of colorful blocks!

Match colors of your ball with blocks to destroy them and gain points. How many towers can you collapse?

- Easy, one finger controls.
- Free to play!
- Play it anywhere anytime.
- Unique, procedurally generated levels.
- Suitable for all ages.
